approved: The transaction rules of this account have already been submitted and you now need to approve the creation of the account. Go to the <0>Pending</0> page, review the account's details, and approve it.
approved_still_pending: You have already approved this account. The account will be created once the necessary amount of  Administrators have approved it.
erc20NoCountervalue: There is no countervalue available for this ERC20 token
no_erc20_children: No children ERC20 token on this account

receive.desc: A new address is generated when a first payment is received on the current address. Previous addresses remain valid and do not expire.
receive.title: Receive funds

view_only_warning: This account is read-only. Transactions cannot be created before you provide transaction rules.
